00015 // enable all poll buttons
00016 - (void)enableControls:(BOOL)enable
00017 {
00018     [sensorPoll1 setEnabled:enable];
00019     [sensorPoll2 setEnabled:enable];
00020     [sensorPoll3 setEnabled:enable];
00021     [sensorPoll4 setEnabled:enable];
00022     
00023     [sensorType1 setEnabled:enable];
00024     [sensorType2 setEnabled:enable];
00025     [sensorType3 setEnabled:enable];
00026     [sensorType4 setEnabled:enable];
00027     
00028     [servoEnableA setEnabled:enable];
00029     [servoEnableB setEnabled:enable];
00030     [servoEnableC setEnabled:enable];
00031     
00032     [servoPollA setEnabled:enable];
00033     [servoPollB setEnabled:enable];
00034     [servoPollC setEnabled:enable];
00035     
00036     [servoPositionReset setEnabled:enable];
00037     
00038     if ( ! enable )
00039     {
00040         [sensorPoll1 setTitle:@"Poll"];
00041         [sensorPoll2 setTitle:@"Poll"];
00042         [sensorPoll3 setTitle:@"Poll"];
00043         [sensorPoll4 setTitle:@"Poll"];
00044         
00045         [servoPollA setTitle:@"Poll"];
00046         [servoPollB setTitle:@"Poll"];
00047         [servoPollC setTitle:@"Poll"];
00048         
00049         [servoEnableA setState:NSOffState];
00050         [servoEnableB setState:NSOffState];
00051         [servoEnableC setState:NSOffState];
00052         
00053         [servoSpeedA setEnabled:enable];
00054         [servoSpeedB setEnabled:enable];
00055         [servoSpeedC setEnabled:enable];
00056         
00057         [servoSpeedA setIntValue:0];
00058         [servoSpeedB setIntValue:0];
00059         [servoSpeedC setIntValue:0];
00060         
00061         int i ;
00062         
00063         for ( i = 0; i < 4; i++ )
00064             isPollingSensor[i] = NO;
00065         for ( i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00066             isPollingServo[i] = NO;
00067     }
00068 }

00071 // begin polling a sensor
00072 - (void)startPollingSensor:(BOOL)start
00073           sensorPort:(UInt8)port
00074       sensorSelector:(NSPopUpButton*)sensorSelector
00075           pollButton:(NSButton*)pollButton
00076 {
00077     NSString *sensorType = [sensorSelector titleOfSelectedItem];
00078     
00079     if ( start )
00080     {
00081         BOOL isUltrasound = NO;
00082         
00083         
00084         // setup sensor
00085         NSLog(@"startPollingSensor: setup sensor");
00086         if ([sensorType isEqualToString:@"Touch"])
00087             [_nxt setupTouchSensor:port];
00088         else if ([sensorType isEqualToString:@"Sound"])
00089             [_nxt setupSoundSensor:port adjusted:TRUE];
00090         else if ([sensorType isEqualToString:@"Light"])
00091             [_nxt setupLightSensor:port active:YES];
00092         else if ([sensorType isEqualToString:@"Light Passive"])
00093             [_nxt setupLightSensor:port active:NO];
00094         else if ([sensorType isEqualToString:@"Sonar"])
00095         {
00096             isUltrasound = YES;
00097             [_nxt setupUltrasoundSensor:port continuous:YES];
00098         }
00099         else
00100         {
00101             NSLog(@"startPollingSensor: unknown sensor type");
00102             return;
00103         }
00104         
00105         
00106         // start polling
00107         NSLog(@"startPollingSensor: start polling");
00108         if ( isUltrasound )
00109             [_nxt pollUltrasoundSensor:port interval:1];
00110         else
00111             [_nxt pollSensor:port interval:1];
00112         
00113         [pollButton setTitle:@"Stop"];
00114         [sensorSelector setEnabled:NO];
00115     }
00116     
00117     else
00118     {
00119         // ultrasound gets special treatment
00120         if ([sensorType isEqualToString:@"Sonar"])
00121             [_nxt pollUltrasoundSensor:port interval:0];
00122         else
00123             [_nxt pollSensor:port interval:0];
00124         
00125         [pollButton setTitle:@"Poll"];
00126         [sensorSelector setEnabled:YES];
00127     }
00128 }

00131 - (void)enableServo:(int)state port:(UInt8)port speedControl:(NSSlider*)servoSpeed
00132 {
00133     if ( state == NSOnState )
00134         [servoSpeed setEnabled:YES];
00135     else
00136     {
00137         [servoSpeed setEnabled:NO];
00138         [servoSpeed setIntValue:0];
00139         [_nxt setOutputState:port
00140                        power:0
00141                         mode:kNXTCoast
00142               regulationMode:kNXTRegulationModeIdle
00143                    turnRatio:0
00144                     runState:kNXTMotorRunStateIdle
00145                   tachoLimit:0];
00146     }
00147 }

00150 // begin polling a servo
00151 - (void)startPollingServo:(BOOL)start
00152                 servoPort:(UInt8)port
00153                pollButton:(NSButton*)pollButton
00154 {
00155     if ( start )
00156     {
00157         NSLog(@"startPollingServo: start polling");
00158         [_nxt pollServo:port interval:1];
00159         [pollButton setTitle:@"Stop"];
00160     }
00161     else
00162     {
00163         [_nxt pollServo:port interval:0];
00164         [pollButton setTitle:@"Poll"];
00165     }
00166 }

00182 {

00184         isPollingSensor[0] = NO;
00185     else
00186         isPollingSensor[0] = YES;
00187     
00188     [self startPollingSensor:isPollingSensor[0] sensorPort:kNXTSensor1 sensorSelector:sensorType1 pollButton:sensorPoll1];

00299 // connected
00300 - (void) NXTDiscovered:(NXT*)nxt
00301 {
00302     [connectMessage setStringValue:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"Connected"]];
00303     [connectButton setEnabled:NO];
00304     [self enableControls:YES];
00305     
00306         [nxt playTone:523 duration:500];
00307     [nxt getBatteryLevel];
00308     [nxt pollKeepAlive];
00309 }

00313 - (void) NXTClosed:(NXT*)nxt
00314 {
00315     [connectMessage setStringValue:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"Disconnected"]];
00316     [connectButton setEnabled:YES];
00317     
00318     [self enableControls:NO];
00319 }

00329 // handle errors, special case ls pending communication
00330 - (void)NXTOperationError:(NXT*)nxt operation:(UInt8)operation status:(UInt8)status
00331 {
00332     // if communication is pending on the LS port, just keep polling
00333         if ( operation == kNXTLSGetStatus && status == kNXTPendingCommunication )
00334                 [nxt LSGetStatus:kNXTSensor4];
00335         else
00336                 NSLog(@"nxt error: operation=0x%x status=0x%x", operation, status);
00337 }

00340 // if bytes are ready to read, read 'em
00341 - (void) NXTLSGetStatus:(NXT *)nxt port:(UInt8)port bytesReady:(UInt8)bytesReady
00342 {
00343     NSLog(@"bytes ready on port %d: %d", port, bytesReady);
00344         
00345     // XXX: problem here
00346         if ( bytesReady > 0 )
00347                 [nxt LSRead:port];
00348 }

00357 - (void)setSensorTextField:(UInt8)port value:(NSString*)value
00358 {
00359     switch ( port )
00360     {
00361         case kNXTSensor1:
00362             [sensorValue1 setStringValue:value];
00363             break;
00364         case kNXTSensor2:
00365             [sensorValue2 setStringValue:value];
00366             break;
00367         case kNXTSensor3:
00368             [sensorValue3 setStringValue:value];
00369             break;
00370         case kNXTSensor4:
00371             [sensorValue4 setStringValue:value];
00372             break;
00373     }
00374 }

00404 // read the sonar values
00405 - (void)NXTLSRead:(NXT*)nxt port:(UInt8)port bytesRead:(UInt8)bytesRead data:(NSData*)data
00406 {
00407     short int d;
00408     [data getBytes:&d length:2];
00409     d = OSSwapLittleToHostInt16(d);
00410     NSString *value;
00411 
00412     // out of bounds
00413     if ( d == 255 )
00414         value = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"--"];
00415     else
00416         value = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%hu", d];
00417     
00418     [self setSensorTextField:port value:value];
00419     //[sensorValue4 setStringValue:value];
00420 }

00430 // read servo values
00431 - (void) NXTGetOutputState:(NXT *)nxt
00432                       port:(UInt8)port
00433                      power:(SInt8)power
00434                       mode:(UInt8)mode
00435             regulationMode:(UInt8)regulationMode
00436                  turnRatio:(SInt8)turnRatio
00437                   runState:(UInt8)runState
00438                 tachoLimit:(UInt32)tachoLimit
00439                 tachoCount:(SInt32)tachoCount
00440            blockTachoCount:(SInt32)blockTachoCount
00441              rotationCount:(SInt32)rotationCount
00442 {
00443     NSString *value = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%d", blockTachoCount];
00444     
00445     switch ( port )
00446     {
00447         case kNXTMotorA:
00448             [servoPositionA setStringValue:value];
00449             break;
00450         case kNXTMotorB:
00451             [servoPositionB setStringValue:value];
00452             break;
00453         case kNXTMotorC:
00454             [servoPositionC setStringValue:value];
00455             break;
00456     }
00457     
00458 }
